AvailabilityRequirement: System should not be unavailable for customers for more than 10 hours
IntegrityRequirement: Data must be accurate and consistent

AvailabilityRequirement: Data should always be available to managers
ConfidentialityRequirement: Only chosen managers can access personal data

AvailabilityRequirement: mail client should not be unavailable for employees for more than 10 minutes
ConfidentialityRequirement: Only authorized people can access own data

AvailabilityRequirement: Database data must be always available for employees(besides maintenance)
ConfidentialityRequirement: Only authorized people can access database data
